TopicTitle: The Christmas season is upon us!

Articles.Content:
Hey everyone, I wanted to let everyone know about a site I\'ve been volunteering and working on for the last 15 years.

www.santasearch.org

It has everything Christmas on it and our special feature: Letters to Santa. This FREE service allows kids to write a letter to Santa and get a hand crafted reply. These aren\'t generic form letters but replies an actual reply by one of Santa\'s Elves. This service is 100% FREE. We\'ve just opened the feature today and are ready for the kids.

So if you\'ve got kids, stop on by and have them write a letter to Santa today!

PS: If you\'d like to be a volunteer Elf and help us answer letters (you must be over 18), send me a PM here and I will point you in the right direction.

Cheers and Happy Holidays!

Capt\'n Skunky

aka Elf Loopy

When I caught sight of the title my immediate reaction was a not-quite-totally humorous 'BAH! HUMBUG!'

But on reading the post I thought 'yes, nice idea!'

To be honest, I hate the commercialization of Christmas. It\'s taken all the magic and mystery out of it. Working on this site is the only thing left that I like about the holiday. If you could only see some of the letters we get from parents after their child gets a letter. Some of the letters themselves are real tear-jerkers.
That is so sweet.
About the commercialization of Christmas, its always been commercialized. The modern look of santa was invented by the Coca-Cola Corporation.

About the commercialization of Christmas, its always been commercialized. The modern look of santa was invented by the Coca-Cola Corporation.

o_o

Rly?
